doc:
John Rawnsley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Rawnsley 0 John Rawnsley (born 14 December 1950) is an English actor and opera singer. He is a baritone and has sung in the San Diego Opera. He sang the role of 'Figaro' in the 1981 film adaptation of The Barber of Seville. Also the role of 'Rigoletto' in Jonathan Miller's famous 'Mafia' production of "Rigoletto" for English National Opera. Opera critics have offered positive reviews of his performances in Verdi's "Rigoletto". John_Rawnsley ( born 14_December_1950 ) is an_English_actor_and_opera_singer . He is a_baritone and has_sung in the_San_Diego_Opera . He sang the_role of ' Figaro ' in the_1981_film_adaptation of The_Barber of Seville . Also the_role of ' Rigoletto ' in Jonathan_Miller 's_famous_'_Mafia_'_production of " Rigoletto " for English_National_Opera . Opera_critics have_offered positive_reviews of his_performances in Verdi 's_"_Rigoletto_" .
